name: Leased or Available Shops per Airport
query:
SELECT
    ta.name,
    SUM(CASE WHEN ts.available_for_lease = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Shops Available for Lease",
    SUM(CASE WHEN ts.available_for_lease = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "Occupied Shops"
FROM
    `tabShop` ts
JOIN
    `tabShop Area` tsa ON ts.area = tsa.name
JOIN
    `tabAirport` ta ON tsa.airport = ta.name
GROUP BY
    ta.name;
report_name: Leased or Available Shops per Airport
